name: American Psycho for the Nintendo DS
name_original: American Psycho for the Nintendo DS
description:
Play on your PC using a NDS Emulator or play on your actual DS console using a DS flash cart. Developed with DS Game Maker. One file has NitroFS enabled and one doesn't. The NitroFS file has sound but will not work on many cartridges for the Nintendo DS. NitroFS does however work on emulators.

Big thanks to redshibe and Demi and the Goons for content used in the game and for the general idea of the game. Also much of the content in the game is taken from the original movie. The songs used are parodies of We Didn't Start The Fire by Billy Joel, Jean Cutscene by temmie f***r, and Hip To Be Square by  Bill Gibson, Sean Hopper, and Huey Lewis.
